This is a test generated Rmd file. This will test how the .Rmd is rendered into html by examining the creation of plots and code chunks. 


```
# This is a code chunk
>>> print("Hello, World!")
```

Let's test the R code chunk 

```{r}
print("This is an R code chunk")

## a fast way to generate *sorted*  U[0,1]  random numbers:
rsunif <- function(n) { n1 <- n+1
   cE <- cumsum(rexp(n1)); cE[seq_len(n)]/cE[n1] }
plot(rsunif(1000), ylim=0:1, pch=".")
abline(0,1/(1000+1), col=adjustcolor(1, 0.5))
```
